Package civitas.celestis.graphics.model

Interface Model

public interface Model
A three-dimensional graphical model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ModelFace
    getFace(int i)
    Returns the ith face of this model.
    ModelFace[]
    getFaces()
    Returns an array containing every face of this model.
    int
    getNumFaces()
    Returns the number of faces this model has.
    int
    getNumVertices()
    Returns the number of vertices this model has.
    Double3
    getVertex(int i)
    Returns the ith vertex of this model.
    Double3[]
    getVertices()
    Returns an array containing every vertex of this model.

  • Method Details

    • getVertices

      @Nonnull Double3[] getVertices()
      Returns an array containing every vertex of this model. Since this is a direct reference, changes in the return value will be reflected to this model.
      Returns:
      The array of every vertex of this model

    • getVertex

      @Nonnull Double3 getVertex(int i) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns the ith vertex of this model.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of vertex to get
      Returns:
      The vertex at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - When the index i is out of bounds

    • getNumVertices

      int getNumVertices()
      Returns the number of vertices this model has.
      Returns:
      The number of vertices this model has

    • getFaces

      @Nonnull ModelFace[] getFaces()
      Returns an array containing every face of this model. Since this is a direct reference, changes in the return value will be reflected to this model.
      Returns:
      The array of every face of this model

    • getFace

      @Nonnull ModelFace getFace(int i) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns the ith face of this model.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of face to get
      Returns:
      The face at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - When the index i is out of bounds

    • getNumFaces

      int getNumFaces()
      Returns the number of faces this model has.
      Returns:
      The number of faces this model has
